verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise I will praise you, Lord,
with all my heart, O God I
will tell the wonders of your
ways, and glorify and your name.
Praise, I will praise you,
In you I will find the source of
all my joy. Al-le-lu-ia!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Love I will love you Lord with
all my heart. O God, I will tell
the wonders of you ways,
and glorify you name.
Love, I will love you, Lord,
with all my heart. In you I will
find the source of all my joy.
Al-le-lu-ia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Serve, I will serve you, Lord,
with all my heart. O God, I
will tell the wonders of your
name. Serve I will serve you,
Lord, with all my heart. In you
I will find the source of all my
joy. Al-le-lu-ia!
